Name: CarryMMU
Author: Felix Gaisbauer
LongDescription: A carry MMU that supports both, single handed and both handed.
ShortDescription: Implementation of a comprehensive carry MMU

Parameters.Name: TargetID
Parameters.Description: The id of the object which should be carried

Parameters.Name: Hand
Parameters.Description: The hand of the carry motion

Parameters.Name: AddOffset
Parameters.Description: Specifies whether an offset is automatically added to the carry position considering the object dimensions

Parameters.Name: CarryTargetID
Parameters.Description: Specifies an optional carry target. If defined, this is used instead of the underlying posture as target.

Parameters.Name: CarryDistance
Parameters.Description: Specifies an optional distance for both handed carrying without a carry target.

Parameters.Name: CarryHeight
Parameters.Description: Specifies an optional height for both handed carrying without a carry target.
